ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectHon. Eldon J. Simpson ** REMOVAL ALLOWANCE **
PrecisOrder authorizing an additional period from December 7, 2013 to June 6, 2014 for the reimbursement to the Hon. ELDON J. SIMPSON, a Justice of the Court of Queenâ€™s Bench of Alberta, of travelling and lodging costs, including amounts expended for meals, incurred before the establishment of the permanent new residence, or in order to visit from time to time members of the household still residing in the former residence.
AttachmentsAttachment
